description: Dashboard that graphs metrics exported via Prometheus plugin in Kong (http://github.com/kong/kong)

panels.title: Kong shared memory usage by Node ($instance)
Kong worker Lua VM usage by Node ($instance)
RPS per route/service by status code
Request rate (Need to set config.status_code_metrics, it will cause performance impact)
Kong Proxy Latency across all services
Latencies (Need to set config.latency_metrics, it will cause performance impact)
Bandwidth (Need to set config.bandwidth_metrics, it will cause performance impact)
Upstream  (Need to set config.upstream_health_metrics, it will cause performance impact)

title: Kong (official)
